member.name: T:NorthstarET.Lms.Application.Interfaces.ITenantContext
member.summary: Represents tenant context for multi-tenant data isolation

member.name: T:NorthstarET.Lms.Application.Interfaces.ITenantContextAccessor
member.summary: Provides access to the current tenant context in multi-tenant scenarios

member.name: M:NorthstarET.Lms.Application.Interfaces.ITenantContextAccessor.GetTenant
member.summary: Gets the current tenant context, or null if no tenant is set

member.name: M:NorthstarET.Lms.Application.Interfaces.ITenantContextAccessor.GetCurrentTenantId
member.summary: Gets the current tenant ID, or null if no tenant is set
